page.title: 03Great Park Farm,Watchingwell
page.content: Great Park Farm is the largest farm in the area and it is an{arable}farm. It grows{wheat, barley and oilseed {rape.}The farm covers an area of 530 hectares and it comprises of very large fields, which were made by cutting down the hedges that once grew around the fields.This was done so that the farm would produce more crops and the agricultural machinery would be able to operate more efficiently.In order to create a larger farm three other farms were taken over about fifteen years ago.Today the two hundred year old farmhouse and its farm buildings stand alone in a landscape which is a sea of huge fields.The farm needs only four men to work it.
